turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok i want to order a drink from the starbucks on racho in taylor mi

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok no ptoblem, what would you want to drink

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: id like a venti cafe americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk is fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many sugars

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can i get 5 raw sugars

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok 5 raw sugars and whole milk, anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah i think they still have that cinnamon sprinkle stuff right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes you can get cinnamon on top of the drink

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok then i want that added too

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok did you want whipped cream also

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no not this time, i dont really think it tastes that good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok then, no problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: was there anything else you wanted

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no i think thats it just the drink this time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so one venti cafe americano, 5 raw sugars and whole milk with cinnamon on top

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah thats it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok im sending the order, it will be ready in 10 minutes at the starbucks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome thanks a lot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, goodbye
